website_summaries.verdict: It’s no surprise this classic design has stuck around over the years due to its excellent ankle support, premium traction, and wider fit.
cons: Its foot-hugging design may feel a little too snug for some

customer_reviews.title: BOOST!
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t even broken them in and they feel awesome. You really feel the energy return. I’ve always thought Nike air was overrated plus for some reason I usually pop the air somehow. Adidas makes a great shoe and doesn’t charge retarded prices.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Knighten

customer_reviews.title: Great ball shoes
customer_reviews.text: This is the first pair of Adidas basketball shoes i have owned and so far I am impressed. The boost soles add a noticeable amount of cushion and the toe shape is wide which is perfect for me feet. I often have a problem with my toes being too cramped in basketball shoes causing my toenails to break all the time. So far I haven't had that problem with these. There is also pronounced cushion ridges in the lining at the heel which keeps your feet planted inside the shoe which is a must for balling in low tops. So far I am impressed, I just hope they hold up to wear and tear.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Larsen

customer_reviews.title: A little bit narrow.
customer_reviews.text: Despite the fact that these shoes were a bit narrow, I love them! They're cool looking, have great support and grip for playing basketball. I only use them indoors and they're exactly what I was looking for. It took me a long time to find the right ones for style, color, support and grip. So, I wasn't going to let the tiny bit of narrow fit keep me from using them. After a few times, I don't even notice that they were narrow to start. I just don't lace them as tight near the toes.
customer_reviews.author: handletteringpro

customer_reviews.title: Great stability
customer_reviews.text: This is a great shoe for the price. They run a little narrow and felt a bit tight at first but loosened a bit as they broke in. Great stability and comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Erato

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are very comfortable, offer great support for basketball with a well-designed sole and padding in the right spots. I am a former loyal Nike user.............not anymore!
customer_reviews.author: Charles R. Pilgrim

customer_reviews.title: Almost the best shoes
customer_reviews.text: I got these for work. I stand for 9 hours. They have a very soft foam that is really comfortable but there are two cushions at the heals that have caused blisters. Maybe these are good for basketball but for standing they hurt my feet. If those two cushions weren't they they would be great shoes. Maybe this is my fault for using basketball shoes for standing all day. I really like the shoes except for those cushions which ruin them for me. On goes the quest for comfortable works shoes.
customer_reviews.author: wayne

customer_reviews.title: Slip all over the gym
customer_reviews.text: Do not wear these for indoor basketball. They slip and slide all over the place. Good for looks only, not function.
customer_reviews.author: cjoymom

customer_reviews.title: Clean pair of kicks at a good price.
customer_reviews.text: Let me start by saying this is the first pair of basketball shoes I have ever bought. I dont play basketball, I just love the way they look and wear them casually. That being said, I’m very happy with the quality of these shoes. They felt a little snug but after a day or two of wear they have broken in pretty nicely. At the time the 10.5 were $65 and at that price I had to cop. They seem authentic. The stitching, materials and serial #’s are all correct. Overall, super clean pair of kicks for a decent price.
customer_reviews.author: Nick O

customer_reviews.title: Something pokes hard my left heel
customer_reviews.text: Hi everyone, At first everything was great. Great looking shoe and great fit. But after 1 hour wearing them, I started to feel pain on my left heel. I thought to myself maybe it is because they are new, so I took them of. At the next day I try them on again and the pain came back on the exact same spot. A shoe that is supposed to be comfortable, but instead gives you pain.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shoes
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are actually comfortable. I guess I'm just old, the style seems weird to me. I thought it looks like a piece of Styrofoam glued to the heel of the shoe and what I thought was a sticker was actually a part of the design. Like I said, the shoes seem to fit their purpose though
customer_reviews.author: Remi

customer_reviews.title: Too narrow squeezed my feet and gave me cramps
customer_reviews.text: I don't have big feet by any measure but I found these shoes to be far too tight squishing my feet despite me ordering one size larger than my actual size. I tried wearing them once and they gave me such cramps I had to return them.
customer_reviews.author: joel wing

customer_reviews.title: Great high impact support
customer_reviews.text: Excellent shoe. Shoe fits to size and has great ankle support with the high top. The Boost midsole feels like a cloud. I use these for jumping rope mostly. I have gone through several shoes trying to find a pair suitable for high impact jumping and these definitely provide the protection I need.
customer_reviews.author: joseph solis

customer_reviews.title: They are snug...really really snug..but clumpy looking
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were super tight when I first put them on, then after walking around inside for a few hours they loosened up and became very comfortable. I got these for dodgeball, but they just look too clumpy and big and it just wast my style and the look just wasn't doing it for me.
customer_reviews.author: DanDaReviewer

customer_reviews.title: now sitting in my closet
customer_reviews.text: waiting too long try on and now past return date and even though I own several Adidas sneakers, these ran small and I cannot wear them.
customer_reviews.author: EricInPA

customer_reviews.title: My Bro-in-law loves them
customer_reviews.text: Got these as a gift and my brother in law absolutely loves them. he says they fit great and are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: EthanAndLiamHD

customer_reviews.title: Get em!
customer_reviews.text: Quality shoe. I’m usually more of a Nike girl, so I went out of my comfort zone to purchase these. Bottom line, I’m glad I did! Very comfortable and lots of support around the ankle which I needed. Fit as expected too.
customer_reviews.author: Ava

customer_reviews.title: Are made to last
customer_reviews.text: They hold the toes done really well so you can wear them loose. I am a shoe collector and I love these ones I wear them very often
customer_reviews.author: christian

customer_reviews.title: Fits amazing
customer_reviews.text: They fit good, make sure you get half a size down, I'm a 14 shoe size and got a 13(1/2) because of my previous experience with adidas making shoes a bit to big, best buy so far they fit will and snug, going to walk around in the house before I let them loose on the courts
customer_reviews.author: Irlanda

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: My husband love these shoes. Looks exactly like the pic
customer_reviews.author: Jen Odin

customer_reviews.title: Shoes were very large
customer_reviews.text: The color and design looked just as we expected. And the size we ordered, was written inside the shoe. But for some reason the shoes were huge! I am not sure if they were not sized correctly or if they just run really big. So we had to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Helmen

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes, box is not
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are still perfect but the shoebox is in very very bad shape, had to throw them away
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: SMH
customer_reviews.text: I don’t like the fact that it did not come in a box! It was supposed to be a Father’s Day gift. Smh! They just bagged it in a package as if it was used or something. 99 dollars I spent for it to come without the box. Smh
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic show at a great price. I have nerve damage in my right foot and these don’t irritate it at all.
customer_reviews.author: Eliot Ness

customer_reviews.title: Great but run small
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are fire. They run small though so I'd go a half to a full size up.
customer_reviews.author: Mackenzie

customer_reviews.title: Dope af
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are awesome. Unique and stylish design. They demand attention and compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Mady Dear

customer_reviews.title: A amazing shoe for the price
customer_reviews.text: The shoes is amazing it fits perfectly and the shoe looks awesome I love adidas shoes they are the only shoes I where
customer_reviews.author: cordell Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and fit
customer_reviews.text: Hat these about a month and I am very happy with the quality and fit.
customer_reviews.author: martreb97

customer_reviews.title: Light comfort
customer_reviews.text: I like the unique style and they feel comfortable and light when running up and down the court.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good look-good price
customer_reviews.text: I get lots of compliments wearing this shoe. It is very stylish and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby psysch.

customer_reviews.title: Can I return these and get another pair sent back?
customer_reviews.text: Was for a Christmas present and when tried on the day ornament Christmas it was too big
customer_reviews.author: Ashtyn

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: My son loved the shoes and the price was awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Blank

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: It met my expectation and am so happy with the shoes😁
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shoe
customer_reviews.text: Loved that the item was sent immediately and as described
customer_reviews.author: K.C. Rivers

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and good support
customer_reviews.text: This my fouth pair so that means I love these basketball shoes
customer_reviews.author: calvin jordan

product_meta.title: adidas Men's Marquee Boost Low Basketball Shoe
product_meta.description: A classic look gets upgraded with modern details. These men's low-cut basketball shoes are built for quickness and agility on the hardwood. They have a molded ankle collar with a cushioned heel for support and comfort. A responsive midsole returns energy on every jumper while the herringbone outsole provides extra grip as you stop and go on a dime.
feature_bullets: Shaft measures approximately mid-top from arch
Classic B-ball style designed for extra comfort on the hardwood
Lightweight textile upper provides durability; Padded heel collar for extra support
Boost is our most responsive cushioning ever, delivering incredible energy return: The more energy you give, the more you get
Zonal herringbone rubber outsole for grip
